actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to clarify coverage of certified nurse-midwife services performed outside the maternity cycle under the medicaid programs.

summary.text: Amends title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act to change the definition of certified nurse-midwife services (and thus allow certified nurse-midwives to receive payment under Medicaid for all services which such practitioners are legally authorized to perform under State law or regulations).

titles.title: A bill to amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to clarify coverage of certified nurse-midwife services performed outside the maternity cycle under the medicaid programs.
